page.title: 14WORKING AT WINSHAM SCHOOL...
page.content: My Mum is called Cheryl.She works at Winsham School as a dinner lady.After dinner she looks after us at playtime.Sometimes we go to play on the playing field at dinner playtime.After play Mum has her dinner in the School kitchen.Then she helps Mrs Bone.After her dinner she goes home.After school she comes and looks after the Taxi people until the Taxi comes.My Dad is called Mike.He works in Yeovil at the Ace Project.He does lots of other things.Most of the people who work with him are punks.My dad is sort of a teacher because he teaches the punks to do things.The Ace Project is something like teenage school really.It helps the school leavers get a job.
